name: Heart of Evil (GorriDev)
description:
Heart of Evil is a procedurally generated, simultaneous turns, tile-based game.
You're in a boat, going upriver. Don't die and don't run out of fuel.

Fight river patrols of mutant tribes as you make your way up the river and towards the unknown, using whatever gun you can scavenge.

The game's in alpha but it's completable and features 5 procedurally generated areas culminating in a bossfight. A full playthrough should take 5 minutes.
